before-pa.narrative-text-1: Kua tae atu ahau i te tōnga o te rā.
before-pa.narrative-text-2: Kua kite ahau i tōku whānau.
before-pa.narrative-text-3: Te kakara pai o te kai.
before-pa.narrative-text-4: Inā te koa ki te hoki ki te kāinga.

landscape-view.line-1: Taku roa ki wāhi kē, kua hoki rā anō ahau ki te kāinga, ki tōku whānau.
landscape-view.line-2: Te maha o ngā rā o taku haerenga, nāwai rā, kei te pito o tēnei whārua te pā.
landscape-view.line-3: Me whakawhiti ahau i ngā mānia...
landscape-view.line-5: ...engari, tuatahi, me kimi ahau i te ara tika kia puta i te ngāhere.
landscape-view.line-6: Ko te kōrero o tōku whānau, ka kite ahau i te tohu muna: kei tēhea o ngā rākau rimu te whakawhitinga awa.

main.browser-recommend: Whakamātauria tētahi pūtirotiro kē, pērā ki te Google Chrome, te Firefox rānei kua whakahoungia.
main.credit: I whakaputaina tēnei paetukutuku nā te pūtea a te Tāhuhu o te Mātauranga, mō te National Digital Readiness Programme, Kia Takatū ā-Matihiko. Kua purutia, kua whakahaerehia e te University of Canterbury, Computer Science Education Group. E tukuna ai ngā ihirangi o te paetukutuku kei raro i te Creative Commons BY-SA 4.0, ā, ko te paetukutuku pāhekoheko nei kei raro i te raihana MIT. Ka kitea hoki ngā raihana o ngā putunga tuhiwaehere o te tangata kē kei roto i te putunga GitHub. Ka noho te waitohu o Kia Takatū ā-Matihiko me ngā rauemi o te kaupapa nei kei raro i te manatārua a te Karauna.
main.landscape: Tēnā whakamahi i tāu pūrere kia nohopae.
main.problem: Aroha atu! Kua puta mai he raru.
main.start-fern-interactive: Tīmatahia mai i ngā rau huruwhenua
main.start-fern-message: Tīmatahia mai i te karere ā-rau huruwhenua
main.start-river: Tīmatahia mai i te whakawhitinga awa
main.title: He Haerenga Panga HM
